item.description:
A special meetup to share experiences from the annual Plone Conference and sprint which took place in Naples, Italy.

There will be presentations from:
Nate Aune, Jazkarta
Sally Kleinfeldt, The Nature Conservancy
Nathan Sandland, Novell
Aaron Vanderlip, Oxfam America
Dave Fisher, Jazkarta

Location: Googlemap. Please note that while the official location of the church is 1 Norway Street, the meetup entrance is in the center of the long building next to the reflecting pool in the Christian Science Church Park and is closer to Huntington Ave.

Directions: If coming by T, take the green line to the Symphony stop. Hynes Convention Center is also very close, as is Mass Ave (Orange line). Metered street parking on Mass Ave is available but usually pretty tight. An underground parking garage is also available. It costs $5. Let the parking attendant know that you are here for the Plone Meetup hosted by Russ Danner. Call me (Sid) on my cell (781-254-3422) if you have trouble.
item.name: The Boston Plone November Meetup
